subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Shaw Alphabet Books is now online.
msgSnippet: ... I don t believe so. I sent a file called Screen Shot 2012-12-31 at 10.31.06.png ... All I sent was a screen shot .png taken of the page as loaded in
messageBody:
On 31 Dec 2012, at 18:35, Tim <rubik67@...> wrote:

> Well, I'm not sure what's going on, but I do find it interesting that the public and private messages you sent were different. The public message had a 43 byte GIF file called space.gif.

I don't believe so. I sent a file called "Screen Shot 2012-12-31 at 10.31.06.png"

> If you check the source code for my page, you'll see NO reference to a "space.gif" file anywhere or any GIFs of any kind. There's also no Javascript, classes, stylesheets, or anything above HTML 1.0 in the code, maybe HTML 2.0 depending on when the FONT tag was added, so there's no way for me to have hidden it. Privately, you sent me a 222K picture called download.png, which is in the files section now. It all seems OK to me…

All I sent was a screen shot .png taken of the page as loaded in Safari.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
